structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases
Audita Querela, Certiorari, Mandamus And Quo Warranto

law.catch_line: Jurisdiction Of Actions Against Persons Holding Or Claiming Public Office
law.text: The supreme judicial and superior courts shall have like jurisdiction of civil actions brought by the attorney general against a person holding or claiming the right to hold an office or employment, the salary or compensation of which is payable by the commonwealth, a county, city or town.
